mapper.insert: INSERT into board ( user_id, board_title, board_content, board_latitude, board_longitude ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardLatitude}, #{boardLongitude} )
mapper.select: SELECT board_no, user_id, board_title, board_content, board_like, board_latitude, board_longitude, board_date FROM board
SELECT board_no, user_id, board_title, board_content, board_like, board_latitude, board_longitude, board_date FROM board WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
SELECT board_no, user_id, board_title, board_content, board_like, board_latitude, board_longitude, board_date FROM board WHERE user_id = #{userId}
